function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of mobile applications for COVID-19 impact management","Impact":"Inadequate management can lead to inaccurate data and ineffective contact tracing, exacerbating the spread of the virus.","Mitigation":"Ensure strict data validation and accuracy checks, and implement effective contact tracing protocols.","Technologies":"Blockchain, Bluetooth, GPS, GIS","People":"General public, healthcare workers, government officials","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies, app developers"},{"Description":"Adoption of blockchain technology for COVID-19 apps","Impact":"If not implemented properly, blockchain apps may fail to integrate verified data sources, leading to inaccurate validation of COVID-19 data.","Mitigation":"Thorough testing and validation of blockchain integration, use of blockchain experts to ensure data accuracy.","Technologies":"Blockchain, data validation tools","People":"App developers, blockchain experts, data scientists","Owner":"Private companies, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of integration of verified data sources in blockchain apps","Impact":"Increased risk of inaccurate or outdated COVID-19 data, leading to ineffective crisis management.","Mitigation":"Implement data validation mechanisms, establish data source integration protocols, and conduct regular audits of data sources.","Technologies":"Blockchain, data validation tools, audit software","People":"App developers, blockchain experts, data scientists","Owner":"Private companies, government agencies"}]}
